Introduction
============

Smart  Keyword Manager is  a Plone  product making  it easy  to manage
keywords ("tags") using smart folders.  On any smart folder, a new tab
will appear for Managers, allowing  them to do either batch edition of
keywords, or massive addition/removal  on all objects displayed by the
smart folder.

This product is based on SmartKwManager
http://plone.org/products/smart-keyword-manager


Dependencies
============

Tested on Plone 4.
